CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.10b, reactiongestationperiodunit (3N)
E2B (R3): G.k.6b Gestation Period at Time of Exposure (unit) Conformance: Optional, but required if G.k.6a is populated. Data Type: 50AN OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.989.2.1.1.26 Value Allowed: UCUM codes for Month, Week, and Day:{Trimester}
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use the gestational age at the time of the earliest exposure. Gestation period at time of exposure should be expressed by providing both a number and designation of units of days, weeks, months, or trimester.
CustomField.label: Gestation Period (Unit)
